title: 15 Mins Pranayama Practice | 5 Deep Breathing Exercises you should do Daily
description:
Hi Everyone,

This is a 15 mins pranayama practice. You can do this daily before or after your asana practice. 

We will be covering Yogic breathing, Kapalbhati, Bhastrika, Nadi Shodhan and Bhramari Pranayama in this practice. When done on a daily basis, these pranayama help in activating internal energy, releasing stress and calming the mind.

Once you are ready, find a comfortable spot and lets get going!

-------------------------------------------
For more follow me on:

channelDescription: Welcome to Bharti Yoga on YouTube! 🌿 Founded by Bharti, an Internationally Certified Yoga Instructor, Childbirth Educator, and IIM Bangalore alumna with 7+ years of experience in healthcare, this channel is your go-to space for free yoga content. Bharti is passionate about helping you achieve your health and fitness goals through yoga and mindful living. Subscribe now for expert-guided sessions and tips for every stage of life! 💪

comments: Hi Everyone, if you are looking for more pranayama videos, check out the pranayama playlist on Bharti Yoga : https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL_UNwumabFwXclh9j1hdUnmW-EDmCBOwg
I am very much thankful to you.i am an old person about 78 years of age. I am practicing the same since October 2023. I feeling comfortable , thank you again

I had COVID six weeks ago, and did this routine every day, on a daily basis, along with some very gentle Wim Hof breathing (building up gradually).  Though I was very short of breath at the end of quarantine, my breathing routines kept me out of serious trouble, and I was able to avoid hospitalization.  I have been doing your exercises for months.  Thank you.
Started it 10 days ago and i am loving it , does anyone still doing it in 2024 ?
